application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to the partial discharge of the area shown on the plan Planning Boundary Plan dated 11/01/2023 of condition 3 (Construction Environmental Management Plan); condition 9 (Construction Transport Management Plan) and condition 16 (Landscape and Ecology Management Plan) in respect of High Street South and Claremont Park Road (Part 1) of planning permission reference 18/6645/FUL, dated 18 March 2019 (as amended by 20/3706/NMA approved on 24 Sep 2020, 21/0888/NMA approved on 07 May 2021 and 21/1343/NMA approved on 22 Jul 2021) in relation to the construction of highway infrastructure and associated public realm comprising: High Street South (East Works), Claremont Park Road (Part 1), Claremont Avenue south of High Street South (East Works) required in association with Phase 1 (South) sub-phase of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area (F/04687/13).Submission of details pursuant to the discharge of condition 22 (Estate Management Framework) of planning permission reference 18/6645/FUL dated 18/03/19 (as amended by 20/3706/NMA approved on 24 Sep 2020, 21/0888/NMA approved on 07 May 2021 and 21/1343/NMA approved on 22 Jul 2021) relating to Highways and Public Realm associated with Phase 1 (South) of the consented redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood regeneration area (F/04687/13).
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
